description: This file defines and configures an AI agent named 'AgnoAssistVoice' using the Agno framework. It imports necessary modules, sets up directory paths, and creates an Agent instance with specific models, tools, storage, and instructions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with models, tools, storage, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models with support for modalities and audio configuration.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: PythonTools
classes.description: Provides Python-related tools for the agent, such as file reading capabilities.

methods.name: Path.parent
methods.description: Returns the parent directory of the given path.

methods.name: Path.joinpath
methods.description: Joins one or more path components intelligently.

methods.name: Path.mkdir
methods.description: Creates a new directory at the given path.

methods.name: dedent
methods.description: Removes any common leading whitespace from every line in text.
